text: The 1962 Asian Games, officially known as the IV Asian Games, was a sports event in Jakarta, Indonesia. It occurred from 24 August to 4 September 1962. There were 120 events from 13 sports and disciplines. ==References== Category:1962 in sports Category:1962 in Asia 1962 Category:History of Java Category:Jakarta Category:Sport in Indonesia
title: 1962 Asian Games
